thread.title: Frozen frolic

author: hlkim
title: Frozen frolic
text:
Frozen frolic February 4, 2017 
UW-Madison students and members of the community celebrated the season at the Hoofers Winter Carnival Saturday on Lake Mendota in front of Memorial Union Saturday. 1 Dozens of students take part in a broomball tournament hosted by Rec Sports. Photo by: 2 Courtney Klatt gives human bowling a try. Photo by: 3 Who needs skates if you've got boots? Photo by: 4 Ice golf is best played facing away from the Terrace. Photo by: 5 Joey Horan, left, and James Oelke, right, fight for possession during the broomball tournament. Photo by: 6 Montana Hodur lines up her putt as Ashley Squiares (left), Courtney Klatt and Dan Klundt look on. Photo by: 7 Joe Geissler (left) edges out Eric Janssen to get the ball. Photo by: 8 Jennifer Stevens flies her creation from the kite-making workshop. Photo by:
